response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I think it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its exceptional benefits, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it can bring to you. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 120}
